CustomField.description: Check whether the submitted account is located in one of the restricted countries.
CustomField.formula: OR( BillingCountry == 'IR', BillingCountry == 'CU', BillingCountry == 'SY', BillingCountry == 'KP', BillingCountry == 'SD', BillingCountry == 'BY', BillingCountry == 'RU', ShippingCountry == 'IR', ShippingCountry == 'CU', ShippingCountry == 'SY', ShippingCountry == 'KP', ShippingCountry == 'SD', ShippingCountry == 'BY', ShippingCountry == 'RU' )
CustomField.label: IsRestrictedCountry
